title: qqwx
author: qqwx
created_time: July 12, 2023, 03:26:21 PMLast edit: August 11, 2024, 08:38:47 AM by qqwx
content: Anaphora AI is a decentralized Artificial Intelligence platform and marketplace that offers AIaaS (Artificial Intelligence-as-a-Service) solutions powered by blockchain technology. Anaphora AI is democratizing AI solutions and services and making them more accessible for businesses and consumers alike. AI solutions developers can list and sell their AI solutions in our marketplace. ANAPH token is an ERC-20 token. It's an AI utility token we created for the Anaphora AI ecosystem. Bounty Related All questions: Group Here Channel HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Monday/Tuesday Forum time); Otherwise, you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsDear Bounty Hunters, We delightfully announcing the Anaphora AI bounty program has been launched. The Bounty will run the following week. Work properly and submit on time. Bounty Rewards 28M tokens. Week 1 (12 July - 18 July)..........ENDWeek 2 (19 July - ¬†25 July)..........ENDBounty reward will be Divided below sections, üåç Section A: Twitter campaign (30%)üåç Section B: Instagram Campaign (10%)üåç Section C: Youtube Campaign (15%)üåç Section D: Article Campaign (15%)üåç Section E: Discord Campaign (15%)üåç Section F: Telegram Campaign (15%)Mandatory Rules‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group; & Discord;‚ñ†Must join  Bounty telegram group  &  Chanel;‚ñ†Must follow us on Twitter;‚ñ†Must join us on Discord;‚ñ†Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;‚ñ†Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;‚ñ†Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;‚ñ†We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;‚ñ†The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,‚ñ†Each Week will end Tuesday at 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form‚ñ†Post a reply before join campaign‚ñ†Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostForum Username: Telegram username: Which Campaign you joined: ERC-20 wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Instagram Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Youtube Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Discord Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Telegam Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE LIMIT - Maximum 500 ParticipantsRules of Twitter Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Twitter page;‚ñ†Minimum 100 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with #AnaphoraAI #ANAPH #ANAPHtoken #ERC20 #ETH;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Your Twitter account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;LIMIT - Maximum 500 ParticipantsRules of Instagram Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Instagram ;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Repost & likes+Comment 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with #AnaphoraAI #ANAPH #ANAPHtoken #ERC20 #ETH;‚ñ†Your Instagram account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;LIMIT - Maximum 200 ParticipantsRules of Youtube:‚ñ†Subscriber Anaphora AI Official Youtube Channel  ‚ñ†Minimum 100 Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Subscriber must be public;‚ñ†Video minimum length 2 minutes;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word Anaphora AI. And Use hashtag #AnaphoraAI #ANAPH #ANAPHtoken #ERC20 #ETH;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link and also Telegram link;‚ñ†Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username,& ERC-20 address in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 500-5000 (Extra 1 stakes)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)LIMIT - Maximum 200 ParticipantsRules of Article:‚ñ†Content Must be original;‚ñ†Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;‚ñ†The article must be up to 500 words;‚ñ†We don‚Äôt allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ‚ñ†Content must be in English‚ñ†Maximum 4 content will accept for one person;‚ñ†Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Facebook Link, also Telegram link;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username, ERC-20 address in Video DescriptionContent Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesLIMIT - Maximum 300 ParticipantsRules of Discord Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Discord group If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†Positive message in Anaphora AI Group 5 times every week (Normal message, not robotic or no hashtag) & grow up your level ;‚ñ†Do not spam into the discord group;‚ñ†Do not use slag language in the Discord group;‚ñ†Submit your message link End of the week (Monday/Tuesday Forum time)Discord Rewards#5 Stakes every week LIMIT - Maximum 500 ParticipantsRules of Telegram Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†Add our AVATAR and name ( "Your Name | Anaphora AI Ambassador" ) - Mandatory;‚ñ†Positive message in Anaphora AI Group 2 times every week;‚ñ†Post minimum 5 positive messages about Anaphora AI to other Crypto Telegram groups (Normal message, not robotic or no hashtag);‚ñ†Do not spam into the telegram group;‚ñ†Do not use slag language in the telegram group;‚ñ†Submit your message link End of the week (Monday/Tuesday Forum time)Telegram Rewards#5 Stakes every week  SPREADSHEET / Participants ListESCROW ADDRESS[N.B- Its Escrow Campaign.Token distribution will be done by the Bounty team. I am the only bounty manager of this project. I am not responsible for the bad things about this project. I have the right to change any rules of this project.]
